info.name: Redis Cache Demo
info.description:
1. First call (not cached, 6s delay)  
    curl [http://localhost:8080/api/product/1](http://localhost:8080/api/product/1)
    
2. Second call (cached, instant)  
    curl [http://localhost:8080/api/product/1](http://localhost:8080/api/product/1)
    
3. Clear Redis cache  
    curl -X DELETE [http://localhost:8080/api/cache/clear](http://localhost:8080/api/cache/clear)
    
4. Call again (cache cleared, 6s delay again)  
    curl [http://localhost:8080/api/product/1](http://localhost:8080/api/product/1)
